title: Smiling Child
description: Ask the child to laugh out loud. Capture the joy.

title: Family Hug
description: All members group tightly, with heads close.

title: Romantic Gaze
description: Have them look into each other's eyes, forehead to forehead.

title: Confident Stance
description: Shoulders back, arms crossed or hands on hips.

title: Elegant Profile
description: Turn head slightly, soft smile. One shoulder toward the camera.

title: The First Dance
description: Capture the couple mid-spin or soft moment.

title: Glamour Recline
description: Soft lighting, laying on side with one hand on face.

title: Focus Tip
description: Use leading lines to draw attention to the subject.
